lead_paragraph: Former paceman Ryan Harris has taken a major step towards achieving his ambition of becoming Australia's permanent bowling coach after the 36-year-old was handed the role for the team's limited-overs tour of South Africa.

headline.print_headline: Harris to Coach Australia Bowlers on South Africa Tour
headline.main: Harris to Coach Australia Bowlers on South Africa Tour

snippet: Former paceman Ryan Harris has taken a major step towards achieving his ambition of becoming Australia's permanent bowling coach after the 36-year-old was handed the role for the team's limited-overs tour of South Africa....
